events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected and I am not satisfied.
The customer case has been categorized under refund due to the request about returning the product and getting money back.
The case has been assigned to a customer service representative to handle the refund request for the order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide the order number?
To process your refund, can you send us the reason for the return and any pictures of the product if applicable?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product just doesn’t match the description and looks different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the information. We can offer a full refund once you return the product. I will send you the return shipping label via email shortly.
That sounds good, I appreciate the help. I will return the item as soon as I get the label and hope to get the refund processed quickly.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the product back, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to check if you have shipped the product back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent the package yesterday. Thank you for following up. I look forward to the refund confirmation.
We have received your returned product and your refund has been completed. Please check your payment method for confirmation.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
I completed the survey. Thank you for the prompt and helpful service with the refund process.
The case has been formally closed following successful refund and positive customer feedback.
